name: Rock, Paper, Scissors: Showdown!
description:
Play as one of two bouncing balls in this twist on the classic Rock Paper Scissors formula. After bumping into a wall, players will be given a half second window to decide their next direction. Your goal is to bump into your opponent while in the correct mode (Rock, Paper, or Scissors) to beat their selection.

------------------------------------

TWO GAMEPADS ARE NEEDED

Controls:

Left joystick - bounce direction

Square - change to rock

X - change to paper

Circle - change to scissors
